scripts.gl:install: rm -fr node_modules && rm -fr frontend/node_modules && rm -fr backend/node_modules && yarn && yarn --cwd frontend && yarn --cwd backend && yarn global add sequelize-cli
scripts.be:initbasepg: docker-compose -f docker-compose-pg.yml down -v && docker-compose -f docker-compose-pg.yml up -d && sleep 3 && rm -fr backend/node_modules && yarn --cwd backend && node backend/scripts/initbase-setup.js && sleep 3 && yarn --cwd backend dev
scripts.be:initbasemysql: docker-compose -f docker-compose-mysql.yml down -v && docker-compose -f docker-compose-mysql.yml up -d && sleep 3 && rm -fr backend/node_modules && yarn --cwd backend && node backend/scripts/initbase-setup.js && sleep 3 && yarn --cwd backend dev
